extension.summary: Simple Wizard is a lightweight template for installing builds on Kodi. Has some code from Aftermath Wizard by Surfacingx. Skin Switch by OpenELEQ. Base code by BYB. Credits to them and all others who contributed. Please report any bugs to @slamious on Telegram/Twitter.

extension.description: Customizable repository which acts as a proxy for defined GitHub users' add-ons updates.
extension.news: - Allow running in standalone mode - Migrate to GitHub API - Add support for "tag_pattern" field - Add support for private repositories by supplying a "token" - Try to automatically determine zip ref from version - Multiple minor improvements

extension.description: A repository for alpha releases of jurialmunkey's skins.

extension.summary: Background loading animation for Arctic Horizon.

extension.description: Movie Genre Icons for Horizon skin

extension.news: 1.7 - Fix for Matrix[CR]1.6 - Add string translations[CR] - Allow install on Matrix[CR] - Remove unused window[CR]1.5 - Fix typo in description[CR]1.4 - Add Arctic Horizon as a dependency[CR]1.3 - Fix hanging on exit[CR]1.2 - Add addon artwork[CR]1.1 - Added widget label setting[CR]1.0 - Initial release

extension.summary: Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger.
简洁、极简、雅致、简约、清爽。
extension.description: This is a light mod of Arctic Zephyr 2 by heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 is a minimalistic skin created by jurialmunkey and moded to work with Kodi 19 Matrix by pkscout. The skin is designed to be simple so that the user can focus on their media content.

Esta es una ligera modificación de Arctic Zephyr 2 realizada por heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 es un skin minimalista creado por jurialmunkey y adaptado para funcionar con Kodi 19 Matrix por pkscout. El diseño es simple para que el usuario pueda centrarse en su contenido multimedia.

Jest to modyfikacja skórki Arctic Zephyr 2 autorstwa heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 jest minimalistyczną skórką stworzoną przez jurialmunkey i zmodowaną do pracy z Kodi 19 Matrix przez pkscout. Skórka została zaprojektowana jako prosta, aby użytkownik mógł skupić się na swojej zawartości multimedialnej.
这是由 heppen 制作的 Arctic Zephyr 2 皮肤的轻量修改版。Arctic Zephyr 2 是一款由 jurialmunkey 创作的极简风格皮肤，经 pkscout 适配后可用于 Kodi 19 Matrix 版本。该皮肤采用简约设计，旨在让用户能专注于自身的媒体内容。

extension.summary: Klar, minimalistisch, elegant, einfach, leicht. Basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Limpio, minimalista, elegante, simple, ligero. Basado en el original Arctic: Zephyr skin por jurialmunkey.
Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Net, minimal, élégant, simple, léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Švari, minimali, elegantiška, paprasta, lengva. Basato sull'originale Arctic: Zephyr skin di jurialmunkey.
Schoon, minimaal, elegant, simpel, licht. Gebaseerd op de originele Arctic: Zephyr skin door jurialmunkey.
Prosta, minimalista, elegancka i lekka. Na podstawie oryginalnego skinu Arctic: Zephyr autorstwa jurialmunkey.
Curat, minimalist, elegant, simplu, ușor. Bazat pe pielea originală Arctic: Zephyr de jurialmunkey.
Опрятный, минималистичный, элегантный, простой, светлый. Основано на оригинальном скине Arctic: Zephyr от jurialmunkey.
extension.description: Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey und ist ein minimalistisches, klares und simples Interface für deine Medien mit dem gewissen Etwas.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded est basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr, créé par jurialmunkey. Arctic se focalise sur le fait d'être simple, claire et minimaliste.
